sentences.en: Jeff: Isn't that the Olympic Anthem?
sentences.cn: 杰夫: 这不是奥运会会歌 么 .

sentences.en: The anthem that the organist played cemented Soapy to the iron fence.
sentences.cn: 风琴师弹奏的赞美诗音乐把苏贝胶在铁栏杆上了.

sentences.en: The band played the Czech anthem.
sentences.cn: 这支乐队演奏了捷克国歌。

sentences.en: The European anthem was played at the opening and closing ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 欧洲颂歌在开幕式和闭幕式上演奏。

sentences.en: There is no flag raising or national anthem played.
When you walk out ( at Anfield ) and hear the fans singing the anthem, it helps.
sentences.cn: 每当你走出 ( 安菲尔德球场 ) 时你总会听到利物浦的球迷在高歌.

trans.tran_cn: [宗]赞美诗，圣歌，赞歌，校歌，国歌，圣歌，赞歌
